snippet: The wall fell at 656 Myrtle Avenue in Bedford-Stuyvesant, the police said, burying the three workers beneath a pile of cinder blocks.
abstract: One worker is killed and two others are seriously injured when wall collapses on them at Bedford-Stuyvesant, Brooklyn, construction site; Buildings Dept had received a complaint in May about unsafe working conditions at the site.
lead_paragraph: The wall fell at 656 Myrtle Avenue in Bedford-Stuyvesant, the police said, burying the three workers beneath a pile of cinder blocks.

headline.main: One Worker Dies and 2 Are Injured in Wall Collapse at Brooklyn Construction Site
headline.print_headline: Worker Killed in Wall Collapse at Brooklyn Construction Site
